Guide to Becoming a Social Media Savvy Nephrologists

DocTalks is a library of short video lectures brought to you by doctors from academia, research institutions. Many researchers also think it is the best way to make progress towards human-level AI. In this class, you will learn about the most effective machine learning techniques, and gain practice implementing them and getting them to work for yourself. Read more
